div.span: School Buildings Are Closed Through The End of the School Year
School Buildings Are Closed Through The End of the School Year.

Bloomingdale School District 13 will continue to engage in remote learning through the end of the school year. Please continue to check the District website for the most up-to-date information. Thank you.
